Class LCond

java.lang.Object
  skeletonlisp.LExp.LExp

public class LCond
extends LExp

The data-structural representation of SkeletonLisp's Cond-expressions.

Field Summary

Constructor Summary
LCond(java.util.ArrayList<CondCase> _cases)
          The constructor requires for the cond-expression to be initialized with proper predicate-result pairs, called CondCases.

Field Detail

cases

private java.util.ArrayList<CondCase> cases
Constructor Detail

LCond

public LCond(java.util.ArrayList<CondCase> _cases)
The constructor requires for the cond-expression to be initialized with proper predicate-result pairs, called CondCases.

The type of a Cond is LCONDTYPE.

Parameters:
_cases - all the predicate-result pairs of a Cond expression.
Method Detail

getCases

public java.util.ArrayList<CondCase> getCases()
The method getCases returns a list of all the predicate-result pairs of the cond expression.

Returns:
a list of all the CondCases

toString

public java.lang.String toString()
The method toString is used to display the value of Cond expressions. An evaluator is needed to evalute the actual valua of a particular Cond-expression.

Overrides:
toString in class LExp
Returns:
returns the String ""
